discussion.title: Make Discussion
discussion.desc: Go for a discussion if you want to discuss something

question.title: Ask Question
question.desc: Go for a question if you want to ask a question

article.title: Write Article
article.desc: Go for an article if you want to write an article

most-active.desc: Most active discussions will show up first

most-recent.desc: Most recent discussions will show up first

most-votes.desc: Discussions with most votes will show up first
